Name: Perhaps When We Dream
About the game: Not every dream, but perhaps any dream. Perhaps When We Dream is a short horror game in which you have been pulled deep within a dream, and time is running short. A Lovecraftian creature draws close and you must maneuver a dream hotel in order to find a way to lull the creature back to slumber. Failure means madness.
